duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the Ferry Portfolio and oversee lease administration, tenant relations, property management, project management, procurement, negotiations, and business development initiatives.
Develop and manage operating budgets, asset plans, and collaborate with stakeholders.
Lead and influence project teams, contribute to special projects related to transportation and maritime infrastructure.
Ensure correct interpretation and application of NYCEDC policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree and at least one year of experience in transportation, logistics, maritime, cruise, freight, real estate development, asset management, construction management, management consulting, urban planning and/or economic development.
